price: (71) And he who repents and does righteousness does indeed turn to Allāh with [accepted] repentance.
arabic: وَمَن تَابَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَإِنَّهُۥ يَتُوبُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَتَابٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waman tāba waʿamila ṣāliḥan fa-innahu yatūbu ilā al-lahi matāban
